description: Evaluate and decompile an adaptive value to string. For most values this has the effect of producing a string containing json.

parameters.description: Add whitespace for readability if present and not 0. This parameter can be an integer between 0 and 10 or a string that is used for indentation. If 0 is specified, no whitespace is added to the resulting string. If 1 through 10 is specified, that number of spaces is used.
parameters.name: whitespace
